name: Freak☆Ninja Wars
description:
Freak☆Ninja Wars

English Support
A single player deck builder game in which you control and defeat yokai.
Based on a roguelike and card game system, use your special moves with yokai powers to conquer dungeons.

.

Features,About This

Controlling Specters: Players can join specters, ninjas, gods, etc. as they progress through the scenario.



Once a yokai joins a group, it can be sent out into the dungeon to fight.
Each yokai that joins a group has its own characteristics and special moves, and its fighting style will change dramatically.

.

During the dungeon, you can buy items at the store or sell cards.

Deck Construction and Dungeons: Players can build their decks by attacking dungeons.
When winning, in addition to cards, items, money, and equipment will appear.
Aim to defeat dungeon bosses with a powerful deck configuration.

Standby Phase: As you progress through the scenario, the blacksmith shop or dojo will open.
In the dojo and blacksmith shop, you can purchase equipment, items, and cards that you can initially own when you challenge the dungeon.

Challenge Mode

.After clearing the scenario, the Challenge mode will be released.
In Challenge Mode, you can challenge the strongest dungeon configurations.
Also, in Challenge mode, the treasure chest gacha(item random get event) is released, allowing you to obtain items to take with you to the dungeon
Furthermore, the gacha screen allows the release of adult costumes, and a system can be purchased that allows you to strip your yokai of their costumes during battle.

Sexual and violent expressions

.This game contains anime-style blood splatter, drinking, nipple drawing, and manipulated female genitalia

Implementation Details

.More than 300 cards
More than 200 equipment
More than 20 control yokai
More than 50 hostile specters
More than 20 special events
